mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS='Y'

SELECT CATEGORY_NAME, NOTICE_TITLE, ORIGIN_NAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" FROM NOTICE N LEFT JOIN NOTICE_ATTACHMENT NA USING(NOTICE_NO) JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON(CATEGORY_NO = NOTICE_CATEGORY) WHERE N.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
